DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Effect Ketoconazole Pharmacokinetics NBI-98854 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female volunteer , 18 40 year age . Subjects childbearing potential must agree use hormonal two form nonhormonal birth control study . Female subject must pregnant , give birth within 1 year study start , breastfeeding . Be good general health expect complete clinical study design . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) . Have active clinically significant unstable medical condition within 1 month ( 30 day ) prior screen . Have history substance dependence substance ( drug ) alcohol abuse within 3 month study start . Report two alcoholic beverage daily 14 alcoholic beverage weekly withing 7 day study start . Report use tobacco and/or nicotinecontaining product within 3 month study start . Have know history neuroleptic malignant syndrome . Have significant risk suicidal violent behavior . Have positive human immunodeficiency virus antibody , ( HIVAb ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) antibody result screen history positive result . Have receive investigational drug within 30 day screen plan use investigational drug ( NBI98854 ) study . Have allergy , hypersensitivity , intolerance tetrabenazine . Had blood loss great equal 500 mL donate blood within 56 day study start . Have previous exposure NBI98854 .
